keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour has helped 170,000 small businesses through the recession by allowing them to defer tax payments.
Labour has taken 1/2 million children out of poverty in the UK.
Labour is creating Sure Start Centres for every community.
Labour has provided 89,000 more nurses & 44,000 more doctors.
The NHS has the shortest waiting lists ever.
Labour has brought in free bus passes, winter fuel payments and will bring in free personal care at home for those pensioners with the highest needs.

mentions.tacticalSituation: This election will be a choice between a Labour or Tory government.

issues.health: Labour's NHS guarantees will be scrapped by the Tories if they are elected.

images.caption: Comparison between Labour and Tories on various policies and actions.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The Tories' plans on cutting tax for the richest and putting local jobs and businesses at risk are mentioned in contrast to Labour's achievements and policies.
